courses.title: React Native Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of React Native, including components, state management, and navigation.

courses.title: Advanced React Native
courses.description: Dive deeper into React Native with advanced topics like performance optimization, native modules, and testing.

courses.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript, including ES6 features, asynchronous programming, and functional programming.

courses.title: Mobile UI/UX Design
courses.description: Learn the principles of mobile UI/UX design, including user research, wireframing, and prototyping.

courses.title: State Management in RN
courses.description: Explore state management solutions in React Native, including Context API, Redux, and MobX.
